Running a Kedro Pipeline

Running all engines at once

Once you have defined your project settings, you can run the complete pipeline by using the default run method from Kedro:

> kedro run

This will start the pipeline with all engines aggregated. It corresponds to the pipeline saved as “__default__” key in the pipeline_registry.py output dictionary. For more information on the registry see the bundesliga.pipeline_registry module.

Running specific engine

To run a specific engine, you can use the following command:

> kedro run --pipeline <engine_name>

This will start the pipeline with the engine you choose. It corresponds to the pipeline saved as “<engine_name>” key in the bundesliga.pipeline_registry.register_pipelines output dictionary and the key in the DYNAMIC_PIPELINES_MAPPING dictionary in the settings.py file.
